channel.title: Rails on UCOSP
channel.description: Recent content in Rails on UCOSP

item.title: RailsConf '10
item.description: For those who are interested, RailsConf ’10 has been announced. With the merge with Herb and the release of Rails 3 (now in beta), this year’s RailsConf is going to be awesome. You can save $100 by registering before April. IN ADDITION to that, full time students can receive a 65% off discount using the promo code “rc10fts”. (I’d love to be there this year, but I’ll need to ask for permission from my employer.
